              <li action-type="search_type" filter-type-inlayer="tag" node-type="search_type" action-data="profile_ftype=1&amp;is_tag=1" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_profile_v6&amp;value=tag"><a href="javascript:void(0);">标签</a></li>
                          </ul>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div><div style="height:1px;margin-top:-1px;visibility:hidden;"></div></div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IwS6EzYzf&amp;mid=4478344848574305&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen&amp;pid=9e5389bbly1gcgjwrj8evg206v07lb29" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>1410</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>
                                                    <li>
                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4478344848574305"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>1086</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【今天，听听<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8E%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%A8%E7%89%A9%E7%9A%84%E7%8B%AC%E7%99%BD%23&amp;from=default">#野生动物的独白#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】我是蝙蝠，身体虽小五毒俱全，你确定要尝吗？我是果子狸，人们一度“谈我色变”，但如今又被端上餐桌！我是野兔，人们说我很可爱，我的肉却变成“野味”，毛发变成皮草…<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%8A%E5%A4%A9%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E9%87%8E%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%A8%E6%A4%8D%E7%89%A9%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#今天世界野生动植物日#</a>，让更多人看到↓拒吃野味，不购买野生动物制品！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A4812%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#韩国累计确诊4812例新冠肺炎#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E477%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#韩国新增477例新冠肺炎#</a>】据韩国卫生部门消息，截至当地时间3日0时，韩国再次确诊新增477例新型冠状病毒感染病例，感染者总数升至4812人，死亡29人。2日当天总共报新增600人确诊感染。（总台记者唐鑫） ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IwRub4Pxq&amp;mid=4478320991151428&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen&amp;pid=9e5389bbly1gcgh68enp4j20p00p04b2" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>709</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>
                                                    <li>
                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4478320991151428"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>3857</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4478320991151428&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

            </ul>
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2395%E5%90%8E%E7%81%AB%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E5%B0%8F%E5%A7%90%E5%A7%90%23&amp;from=default">#95后火神山护士小姐姐#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%A1%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%98%AF90%E5%90%8E%E5%81%9A%E4%B8%8D%E4%BA%86%E7%9A%84%23&amp;from=default">#没什么是90后做不了的#</a>】1997年的伏雨佳，是火神山医院ICU里处理垃圾的护士。除夕夜离开父母，偷偷跑到火神山，小伏每天要打包上百袋垃圾，每袋垃圾都细心喷洒消毒液，套上双层黄色垃圾袋，再用塑封条密封袋口。单手能提四五个半人高的垃圾袋，她说：没什么是90后做不了的 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwRtf8rpA" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478320412011998:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478320412011998&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【世卫组织：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%8A%B6%E5%86%B5%E4%B8%8D%E5%AE%B9%E4%B9%90%E8%A7%82%23&amp;from=default">#中国境外疫情状况不容乐观#</a>】当地时间2日，世卫组织总干事谭德塞表示，目前中国新冠肺炎病例数持续下降，但中国境外新冠肺炎疫情状况不容乐观。韩国、意大利、伊朗和日本最令人担忧。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E5%B7%B2%E6%B4%BE%E5%9B%A2%E9%98%9F%E6%8A%B5%E8%BE%BE%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织已派团队抵达伊朗#</a>，支持当地开展防疫措施。目前世卫组织驻伊朗办事处有一名员工确诊，症状轻 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwRfh5nFI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478311751282638:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478311751282638&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478309938854988" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwRclB9Ao?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-03 08:35" date="1583195755000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478309938854988:fromprofile"> 2020-3-3 08:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD2%E5%A4%A9%E6%97%A0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#湖北以外连续2天无新增死亡病例#</a>】据国家卫生健康委员会数据：3月2日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例125例，新增死亡病例31例（湖北31例）。除湖北以外，其他省区市已连续2日无新增死亡病例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478296353600535" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwQQrf6F9?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-03 07:41" date="1583192516000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478296353600535:fromprofile"> 2020-3-3 07:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E7%9A%84%E8%82%BA%E5%92%8CSARS%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E7%9A%84%E5%8C%BA%E5%88%AB%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎患者的肺和SARS患者的区别#</a>有哪些？】中科院院士、陆军军医大学西南医院病理科主任卞修武表示，通过病理观察，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%8E%E8%82%BA%E9%83%A8%E7%97%85%E5%8F%98%E6%9D%A5%E7%9C%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%BD%BB%E4%BA%8ESARS%23&amp;from=default">#从肺部病变来看新冠肺炎轻于SARS#</a>：①新冠肺炎肺的结构破坏和坏死程度比SARS略轻。②两者都有II型肺泡上皮增生，但程度不同，在SARS时，增生非常大比例地掉到肺泡腔里脱落。③两 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwQQrf6F9" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478296353600535:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478296353600535&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%852000%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊超2000例#</a>】当地时间3月2日18时，意大利民防部门负责人安杰洛·博雷利在例行疫情通报中表示，意大利共累计确诊2036例新型冠状病毒感染肺炎病例。其中，现存病例1835例，累计死亡病例52例，累计治愈149例。（总台记者邓宗宇） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【世卫组织：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E8774%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#中国境外累计确诊新冠肺炎8774例#</a>】当地时间3月2日，世卫组织发布最新一期新冠肺炎情况每日报告。截至欧洲中部时间2日10时（北京时间17时），中国境外共64个国家确诊新冠肺炎8774例，死亡共计128例。与前一日报告相比，中国境外新增新冠肺炎1598例。（总台记者朱赫） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%B7%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E5%B0%86%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E6%95%85%E4%BA%8B%E7%BB%98%E6%88%90%E7%83%AD%E8%A1%80%E6%BC%AB%E7%94%BB%23&amp;from=default">#男护士将战疫故事绘成热血漫画#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】赵朋伟是西安交通大学第一附属医院的一名护士，疫情发生后，本在普通外科护理部的他，主动报名支援感染科。他用漫画记录下疫情期受到触动的瞬间，每一幅漫画背后，都有一个令人感动的故事↓↓致敬医护人员！（总台央视记者常青） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%232%E6%9C%8812%E6%97%A5%E5%90%8E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E5%85%A5%E4%B8%B9%E4%B8%9C%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E5%BC%80%E5%B1%95%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%23&amp;from=default">#2月12日后境外入丹东人员全部开展核酸检测#</a>】为严防境外疫情输入，辽宁丹东市2日发布关于境外入丹人员疫情防控补充通告：①对2月12日以后境外入丹东人员，全部开展新冠肺炎核酸检测；②对2月28日以后境外入丹东人员，原则上统一组织到各属地政府定点宾馆集中隔离，并进行核酸检测。（总台央视记者李 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwO5iso4J" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478190246765733:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478190246765733&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%99%E7%89%B9%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#沙特确诊首例新冠肺炎#</a>】当地时间2日晚，沙特卫生部发布公告，确诊一例新冠肺炎病例，患者已被医学隔离。公告显示，该患者从伊朗途经巴林返回沙特，在返回入境后被发现相关症状，随后检验结果显示其感染新型冠状病毒，该病例也是沙特境内首例确诊病例。（总台记者李超） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478180914189505" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwNQfhzSF?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-03 00:03" date="1583164993000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478180914189505:fromprofile"> 2020-3-3 00:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BB%E6%92%AD%E8%AF%B4%E8%81%94%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#主播说联播#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E6%98%AF%E6%9D%80%E7%81%AD%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%9C%80%E6%9C%89%E5%8A%9B%E7%9A%84%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8%23&amp;from=default">#科学是杀灭病毒最有力的武器#</a>】习近平总书记在北京考察新冠肺炎防控科研攻关工作时表示，要<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%91%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E8%A6%81%E7%AD%94%E6%A1%88%E8%A6%81%E6%96%B9%E6%B3%95%23&amp;from=default">#向科学要答案要方法#</a>。对于新型冠状病毒，专家一致认为，我们对它的认识还不全面，在防治诊疗等方面需要有很多尝试。只有遵循科学精神，才能把副作用降到最低，科学方法才是克毒制胜最有力、最 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwNQfhzSF" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478180914189505:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478180914189505&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F32%E5%B2%81%E8%BE%85%E8%AD%A6%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E5%9C%A8%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江32岁辅警牺牲在战疫一线#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%BE%99%E8%AD%A6%E5%BE%AE%E5%8D%9A?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=龙警微博">@龙警微博</a> ：1日，黑龙江七台河市公安局茄子河分局宏伟派出所辅警周明广、于佳昕在岚峰村执行完疫情防控任务后，驾车回派出所，因山道结冰路滑车辆失控，发生单方交通事故。当日21时30分许，周明广经全力抢救无效因公牺牲，年仅32岁。于佳昕正在全力抢救中。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E157%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#德国累计确诊新冠肺炎157例#</a>】据德国联邦疾控机构罗伯特·科赫研究所统计，截至当地时间3月2日15点，德国已累计确诊新冠肺炎患者157例。（总台记者李长皓） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BE%BD%E5%AE%81%E4%B8%80%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E5%9C%A8%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#辽宁一民警牺牲在战疫一线#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6c/2018new_xinsui_org.png" title="[伤心]" alt="[伤心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】昨天，辽宁省阜新市阜蒙县公安局大五家子派出所民警孟宪龙，因突发心脏疾病牺牲在工作岗位上，享年57岁。据了解，疫情发生后，他一直坚守在防控一线，进行人员排查、走访、卡点布控等工作。转发送别！（总台央视记者李承泽） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IwNfmbvnN&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478158042742247" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwNfmbvnN?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-02 22:32" date="1583159540000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478158042742247:fromprofile"> 2020-3-2 22:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【联合国<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E7%90%86%E4%BC%9A%E8%BD%AE%E5%80%BC%E4%B8%BB%E5%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%9E%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%A4%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%A0%B7%23&amp;from=default">#安理会轮值主席国办公室什么样#</a>？<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/c9/2018new_chongjing_org.png" title="[憧憬]" alt="[憧憬]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】3月2日起，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%88%90%E4%B8%BA%E8%81%94%E5%90%88%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%89%E7%90%86%E4%BC%9A%E8%BD%AE%E5%80%BC%E4%B8%BB%E5%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#中国成为联合国安理会轮值主席国#</a>。记者得到特别许可，第一次跟着中国代表团进入了安理会会场↓轮值主席国办公室是啥样？联合国同传怎样做到又快又好？戳↓都在这里！（央视记者徐德智 国广记者钱珊铭） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478158042742247:1034-video:1034%3A4478157793984550:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478158042742247:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67oiwgs" alt="http://t.cn/A67oiwgs" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【习近平：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%91%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E8%A6%81%E7%AD%94%E6%A1%88%E8%A6%81%E6%96%B9%E6%B3%95%23&amp;from=default">#向科学要答案要方法#</a>】习近平总书记2日在北京考察新冠肺炎防控科研攻关工作。他强调，我国是一个有着14亿多人口的大国，防范化解重大疫情和重大突发公共卫生风险，始终是我们须臾不可放松的大事。战胜疫情，我们该怎么做？看图，周知，一起加油！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B2%A9%E6%9D%BE%E5%B8%AE%E4%BD%A0%E9%97%AE%23&amp;from=default">#岩松帮你问#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%99%BD%E5%B2%A9%E6%9D%BE%E5%AF%B9%E8%AF%9D%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%A9%BB%E9%9F%A9%E5%A4%A7%E4%BD%BF%23&amp;from=default">#白岩松对话中国驻韩大使#</a>】截至当地时间下午16时，韩国新冠肺炎感染者总数升至4335人，韩国将如何加强疫情防控？需要哪些帮助？目前，武汉社区如何保障困难人群、外地滞留人群生活供应？白岩松连线中国驻韩国大使邢海明，武昌中南路街道百瑞景社区党委书记王涯玲↓&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwMYxEaeg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478147619572444:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478147619572444&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【直播！关注意大利、墨西哥疫情】截至当地时间1日18时，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E1694%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊新冠肺炎1694例#</a>，较前一日增加566例，为单日最大增长。当地时间1日，墨西哥公布第五例新冠肺炎确诊病例，卫生部官员曾呼吁避免握手及贴面礼。两国最新疫情情况如何？关注↓ （总台记者邓宗宇 央视记者盛嘉迪） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwMSnAYgb" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478143798811451:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478143798811451&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478134886034575" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwME0pjRR?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-02 21:00" date="1583154019000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478134886034575:fromprofile"> 2020-3-2 21:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%9B%A2%E9%98%9F%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%E4%B8%A5%E6%A0%BC%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%AE%9E%E6%96%BD%E8%87%B34%E6%9C%88%E5%BA%95%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山团队建议严格防控实施至4月底#</a>】近日，钟南山院士团队在《Journal of Thoracic Disease》期刊发表研究文章。该研究把1月23日前后的人口迁徙数据及最新的COVID-19流行病学数据，整合到经典传染病学预测模型中，并得出流行曲线。预测显示：①本次疫情中国在2月下旬达到高峰，4月底趋于平缓；②&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwME0pjRR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478134886034575:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478134886034575&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx1.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2F9e5389bbly1gcfvsqyjrdj20to18ftdm.jpg">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478125570762286" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwMoZ3ciW?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-02 20:23" date="1583151798000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478125570762286:fromprofile"> 2020-3-2 20:23</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8D%E8%A6%81%E5%86%8D%E9%9D%A0%E8%BF%91%E6%88%91%E6%80%95%E8%BA%AB%E4%B8%8A%E6%9C%89%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#不要再靠近我怕身上有病毒#</a>】昨天，武汉硚口武体方舱医院外，一群医护人员偶遇摄影记者，请他帮忙拍合影。记者想走近一点，把每个人的脸都拍清楚。医护人员却让他“不要再靠近了”，她们担心自己身上沾染着病毒。拍完照，记者鞠躬感谢，一名医护人员也鞠躬回礼↓这一幕，让大家的眼睛都湿润了。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwMoZ3ciW" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478125570762286:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478125570762286&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478111385550749" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwM26ni0d?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-02 19:26" date="1583148416000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478111385550749:fromprofile"> 2020-3-2 19:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8E%AB%E6%96%AF%E7%A7%91%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E4%B8%80%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#莫斯科确诊一例新冠肺炎#</a>】当地时间3月2日，俄罗斯防疫指挥部表示，莫斯科确诊一例新型肺炎病例。患者是莫斯科居民，前不久从意大利米兰返回。目前患者在莫斯科第一传染病医院治疗，情况稳定。此前俄罗斯境内确诊两例新冠肺炎病例，均为中国公民，已治愈出院。（总台记者王斌 朱静） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <span class="hover">

                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609494766&amp;ssig=wu6Es7Cjfd" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478108789357232" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwLXUDgf6?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-02 19:16" date="1583147796000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478108789357232:fromprofile"> 2020-3-2 19:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%88%AC%E5%B1%B1%E6%89%BE%E4%BF%A1%E5%8F%B7%E7%9A%84%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%A9%E8%83%BD%E5%9C%A8%E5%AE%B6%E4%B8%8A%E8%AF%BE%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#爬山找信号的女孩能在家上课了#</a>】受疫情影响，在江苏上学的初一女生宁欣然滞留在老家湖北荆门。因地处山区，她每晚都要带桌子和充电台灯，爬到山顶找信号上网课，坚持了20多天。近日，当地相关部门工作人员在她家门口竖了根6米多高的竹竿，调试网络并安装信号增强器，她终于可以在家上网课了。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwLXUDgf6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478108789357232:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478108789357232&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【习近平考察新冠肺炎疫情科研攻关和诊疗救治工作】2日下午，习近平先后来到军事医学研究院、清华大学医学院，考察新冠肺炎疫情科研攻关和诊疗救治工作，了解疫苗、抗体、药品、快检产品等研究和应用进展情况，看望慰问专家和科研人员，并主持召开座谈会，听取有关部门负责同志和科研人员的意见和建议 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwLJFlK9K" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478099955182316:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478099955182316&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B523%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#伊朗新增新冠肺炎病例523例#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E5%85%B1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A1501%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#伊朗共确诊1501例新冠肺炎#</a>】据伊朗卫生部最新消息，当地时间3月2日，伊朗新增新冠肺炎523例，新增死亡12例。截至3月2日中午，伊朗共确诊新冠肺炎病例1501例，其中291例康复，66例死亡。目前有疑似病例4312例。(总台记者李健南 倪紫慧) ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4478096470033394"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>1210</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4478096470033394&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>8659</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style="display:none;"></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478094335410684" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwLABmHz6?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-02 18:19" date="1583144351000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478094335410684:fromprofile"> 2020-3-2 18:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B6%E4%B9%8B%E4%B8%BB%E7%AD%89%E4%BD%A0%E5%9B%9E%E6%9D%A5%E6%88%91%E5%B0%B1%E5%8D%B8%E4%BB%BB%23&amp;from=default">#一家之主等你回来我就卸任#</a>】医生邬盛昌从浙江赴武汉战“疫”，出发前，他和妻子小倪紧紧相拥，小倪的眼泪却不敢让他看到。从不操心家务的小倪，开始一人担起家里的大小琐事，照顾老人、安抚孩子。她说，“宝爸，你不在家的日子，我终于成了一家之主，等你回来后马上卸任还给你。”盼早归！（总台央 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2656274875&amp;mid=4478094335410684&amp;pid=9e5389bbly1gcfr72hgiej20u013tdmq" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=9e5389bbly1gcfr72hgiej20u013tdmq"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwLABmHz6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478094335410684:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478094335410684&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478088123652775" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IwLqAfkfJ?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-02 17:54" date="1583142870000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478088123652775:fromprofile"> 2020-3-2 17:54</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【江苏医护人员<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%93%84%E5%A8%83%E5%BC%8F%E7%85%A7%E9%A1%BE%E8%80%81%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A9%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#哄娃式照顾老小孩患者#</a>】武汉同济医院，有一位患有阿尔兹海默症的新冠肺炎患者。刚入院时，爷爷每天吵闹着要回家，为了让这位“老小孩”爷爷开心，江苏援湖北医疗队的护士们给他按摩、画手表、做挎包……如今老爷爷再也不闹着回家了。网友：为白衣天使点赞！祝老爷爷早日康复！（总台央 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IwLqAfkfJ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478088123652775:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478088123652775&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

\/>】广西桂林，两名护士小姐姐得知3名患者出院，突然来了个“熊抱”庆祝；准备下班时，广东援鄂护士听说有鸡汤，兴奋得学小鸡跑；患者出院，两名医护人员跳起了四小天鹅；能带病人打太极，也会画画与患者交流…他们，是抗击疫情的白衣战士，也是最温暖可爱的人↓网 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2656274875\/IwS6EzYzf\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"央视新闻\">\n                                                                                                                        【今天，听听<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8E%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%A8%E7%89%A9%E7%9A%84%E7%8B%AC%E7%99%BD%23&from=default\">#野生动物的独白#<\/a><img class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/6e\/2018new_leimu_org.png\" title=\"[泪]\" alt=    \"[泪]\" type=\"face\" \/>】我是蝙蝠，身体虽小五毒俱全，你确定要尝吗？我是果子狸，人们一度“谈我色变”，但如今又被端上餐桌！我是野兔，人们说我很可爱，我的肉却变成“野味”，毛发变成皮草…<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%8A%E5%A4%A9%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E9%87%8E%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%A8%E6%A4%8D%E7%89%A9%E6%97%A5%23&from=default\">#今天世界野生动植物日#<\/a>，让更多人看到↓拒吃野味，不购买野生动物制品！ ​​​​                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E7%E4%BE%8B%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83%23&from=default\">#浙江新增7例意大利输入病例情况公布#<\/a>：均与浙江首例境外输入病例在意大利同一餐厅工作】2日，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E7%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E5%9D%87%E4%B8%BA%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&from=default\">#浙江新增7例新冠肺炎均为输入病例#<\/a>。该7例病例与首例境外输入病例王某某为密切接触者，在意大利贝加莫同一家餐厅工作，8人一直生活在意大利，无湖北武汉接触史。<br><br>患者蒋某，男，34岁，户籍青田县瓯南街 render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E477%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&from=default\">#韩国新增477例新冠肺炎#<\/a>】据韩国卫生部门消息，截至当地时间3日0时，韩国再次确诊新增477例新型冠状病毒感染病例，感染者总数升至4812人，死亡29人。2日当天总共报新增600人确诊感染。（总台记者唐鑫）
